sentence: A baby seal walks into a bar... ... and says, Ill have anything but a Canadian club.
explanation: A seal is a marine mammal. / Seal refers to a type of alcohol.
first_new_sentence: The seal swam gracefully through the ocean.
second_new_sentence: The bartender opened a new bottle of seal for the customers.

sentence: Why cant dinosaurs clap? Because theyre dead.
explanation: Dead means no longer alive. / Dead can refer to something that is not functioning.
first_new_sentence: The tree was dead and needed to be cut down.
second_new_sentence: The battery was dead after months of use.

sentence: What do you call a poor stripper? ugly.
explanation: Ugly describes an unpleasing appearance. / Ugly can mean something undesirable or unpleasant in a non-physical way.
first_new_sentence: The sculpture was so ugly it was hard to look at.
second_new_sentence: The deal was so ugly that no one wanted to accept it.
